title: Remastered GTA Trilogy Is Finally Official - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.08.21
description:
Janet and Blessing talk GTA Remastered, California's plans to object to Activision settlement, and the fact that PlayStation will seemingly announced a remake of a big game this Christmas.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:07:44 - Housekeeping
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Pranksy & Black Jack
The Roper Report  -
00:08:15 - The GTA Trilogy Remaster is Official
00:26:57 - California plans to object to Activision settlement
00:35:50 - PlayStation will announce ‘a big remake’ this Christmas, musician claims
00:44:00 - Ad
00:47:05 - Jade Raymond’s Haven Studio and What to Expect from Their Upcoming, New PlayStation Exclusive
00:54:15 - Drift is unavoidable
01:04:40 - Out today
01:05:40 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
MON: Blessing and Tim
